rooms.description: A welcoming space with minimal design, equipped with ramp access for wheelchair accessibility and a Vastu-aligned door opening.
An open-plan area combining living, dining, and kitchen. Minimalist furnishing with ample natural light through strategically placed windows per Vastu principles.
Open concept integrated with the living area, designed for efficient workflow. Features built-in cabinetry and a central island with wheelchair accessible counter heights.
Guest bedroom adjacent to a private bathroom. Designed for privacy while ensuring accessibility features are met.
Spacious primary bedroom oriented eastward per Vastu principles, with en-suite bathroom and storage solutions.
Integrated within the main bedroom suite, designed for privacy and accessibility.
Dedicated workout area with open layout, ample space for wheelchair maneuverability, and minimalistic decor.
A landscaped courtyard at the center of the ground floor. Provides natural light to adjacent rooms and serves as a calming focal point per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp leading directly into the central courtyard, designed to invite positive energy.
Strategically placed windows ensuring optimal light and ventilation while preserving privacy and adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Placed for efficient cross-ventilation in the open-plan kitchen area, facilitating natural light entry.
All doorways are designed to be wheelchair accessible with minimum clear widths and appropriate thresholds.

rooms.description: A secondary bedroom designed for privacy. Orientation considered for natural light and Vastu compliance.
Another private room with emphasis on minimalistic design and accessible features including a built-in storage area.
Serves the additional bedrooms, incorporating wheelchair accessibility and essential fixtures.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible staircase with handrails for safety. Positioned per Vastu guidelines to encourage positive energy flow between floors.
Small balconies attached to additional bedrooms offering natural light and ventilation, aligned with minimalist design principles.

rooms.description: A dedicated work area designed for focus and productivity, with ample natural light and minimalistic interiors.
High ceiling storage loft for seasonal items, ensuring the space remains uncluttered per minimalist design ethos.

openings.description: Provides access to a small terrace or roof garden area, designed for relaxation and natural light exposure.
Ensures cross ventilation across the study/work area and storage loft.

building_norms: This design adheres to local Indian building codes, ensuring structural safety, energy efficiency, and Vastu principles. Wheelchair accessibility has been prioritized in all entryways, room transitions, and shared spaces.
vastu_principles: The layout is designed with north and east orientations for primary living areas, central courtyard placement to balance energies, and open-plan design encouraging natural light and airflow.
